overview: Three stories – shaman girls, a veteran of the Moscow BDSM club and a young actor with mental development peculiarities. About different types of human relationships with his body, mind, memory, feelings... Ancient cultures knew about this non-identity of a person to his body. Modern people seem to have forgotten about this, but the fundamental human desire to be free from the limitations of the material world has not disappeared anywhere.…
title: Dreams of the Sky Mausoleum
